description:
Well, here's someone I didn't think we'd hear from again!
We last saw Matthew over four years ago. I remember he was very, very quiet.
So imagine my surprise when I got a phone call from him. And, he was a lot more talkative!
"I remembered that you asked me if I wanted to fuck a dude," he said.
"Well, I don't remember exactly," I replied. "But I'm sure I did!"
"Ummm..." he continued. "Things have changed a bit in my life. I was wondering if the offer was still open."
Fast forward about a week and there he was sitting in front of me.
"Wow, you don't look any different!" I said. And he didn't.
Pavel was sitting next to him and he was fascinated with the situation.
"That's pretty cool," he said. "Four years later!"
"Well, you're going to break him in," I said to Pavel. "You're going to be his first!"
title: Matthew & Pavel
